primarySegments.name: Young Urban Professionals
primarySegments.description: Tech-savvy individuals living in urban areas who prioritize safety and quick communication in emergencies.

behaviors: Download and set up app immediately
Use app during commutes or travel

primarySegments.name: Elderly Living Independently
primarySegments.description: Older adults who live alone and seek reliable ways to alert family in case of emergencies.

problemsNeeds: Need for easy-to-use emergency alert system
Fear of not being able to reach help
Require peace of mind for family
behaviors: Use app as a safety net

primarySegments.name: Parents with Young Children
primarySegments.description: Parents who are concerned about the safety of their children and want a reliable way to ensure their family's security.

problemsNeeds: Desire for quick communication in emergencies
Concerned about losing track of children
behaviors: Set up app for children and caregivers

excludedSegments.name: Rural Residents with Limited Connectivity
excludedSegments.reason: This segment may face challenges with reliable internet or mobile connectivity, reducing the effectiveness of the app's features.
